about_the_game:
This Season Pass allows to purchase the following downloadable content for Atelier Lulua ~The Scion of Arland~ for a discounted price.

Released on June 4th, 2019
- Lulua's Outfit "Mom's Favorite"
- Aurel's Outfit "The Ultimate Knight Supreme"
- Eva's Outfit "Little Girlfriend"

Released on June 25th, 2019
- GUST Extra BGM Pack

Released on July 30th, 2019
- Extra High Difficulty Area: Machina Domain

Note:
- Individual release dates are subject to change.
- Please check the official website for official details and more information.
- The "Atelier Lulua: Season Pass 'Lulua'" is also available with a discount as a part of "Atelier Lulua ~The Scion of Arland~ Digital Deluxe Edition."

Released on June 4th, 2019

- The "Atelier Lulua: Season Pass 'Lulua'" is also available with a discount as a part of "Atelier Lulua ~The Scion of Arland~ Digital Deluxe Edition."
name: Atelier Lulua: Season Pass "Lulua"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 or better, Graphic Memory 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3.4GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better, Graphic memory 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
